<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Disables outdated flows and Business rules</description>
        <name>WSD Deactivate Rsv flows and BRs</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[WSDLogger.info('Fixscript - WSD Deactivate Rsv flows and BRs', 'disabling outdated flows and Business rules - begins');

try {
	//Deactivate Outdated flows
    var flowSysIds = [
        'c89b57acc3d12010cc7060bf4b40ddd7',
        'b2600702c33e6010cc7060bf4b40dd4d',
        '911b9945c31520108ce350aeea40ddea',
        '71546cb4c3512010cc7060bf4b40ddcc',
		'07771464c312411008d1c97b7d40dd05'
    ];
    var rec = new GlideRecord('sys_hub_flow');

    flowSysIds.forEach(function(sysId) {
        if (rec.get(sysId)) {
            rec.active = false;
            rec.update();
        }
    });
} catch (e) {
    WSDLogger.error('Fixscript - WSD Deactivate Rsv flows and BRs', 'Failed to deactivate flows', e);
}

try {
	//Try diactivating Business Rules if not deleted by upgrade
    var businessRules = [
        '3d62f2235b160110c90312300a81c7a8',
		'df2c7e73779001100c03a8aecd5a9951'
    ];
	
    rec = new GlideRecord('sys_script');

    businessRules.forEach(function(sysId) {
        if (rec.get(sysId)) {
            rec.active = false;
            rec.update();
        }
    });
} catch (e) {
    WSDLogger.error('Fixscript - WSD Deactivate Rsv flows and BRs', 'Failed to deactivate BRs', e);
}


WSDLogger.info('Fixscript - WSD Deactivate Rsv flows and BRs', 'disabling outdated flows and Business rules - ends');]]></script>
